title: Sandboarding Experiance in Lima
description: Just minutes outside of Lima, in Chilca, are dunes perfect for a day of outdoor activities. Get your adrenaline pumping on an exciting of off-roading and racing adventure through the dunes. Then hop on a sandboard and make your way down the large mountains of sand in a race against your friends. This private tour is suitable for beginners and includes bottled water and snacks.
all_descriptions: Just minutes outside of Lima, in Chilca, are dunes perfect for a day of outdoor activities. Get your adrenaline pumping on an exciting of off-roading and racing adventure through the dunes. Then hop on a sandboard and make your way down the large mountains of sand in a race against your friends. This private tour is suitable for beginners and includes bottled water and snacks.

reviews.title: Great coaching and vibes
reviews.text: Amazing day out!!Both carlos and the instructor were great vibes and I went from being awful to getting down the dunes! Instructor great at capturing everything on your mobile too.  Truly a great experience!

reviews.title: Amazing, highly recommend!
reviews.text: I would HIGHLY recommend they were so fantastic! They were patient with my 6 and 3 year old. They treated us so well and we had so much fun. I appreciated how mellow they were and understanding of our low skill level  this was such a highlight! Thank you so much! You guys were amazing!

reviews.title: Thrilling and Life Changing Experience
reviews.text: Me and my best friends were looking for something exciting to do in Lima, so we decided to try out sand boarding and could not have been more impressed! We were initially hesitant to book with this company due to the lack of reviews, but definitely made the right decision. Abraham and Carlos were both amazing, and the experience itself was very thrilling! Could not recommend these guys more!

reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
reviews.text: We had such a blast!! The whole experience from being picked up from our Airbnb to getting dropped back off again was great! It was fun (and maybe a little bit thrilling) riding in the car with Carlos, he was engaging and quick to answer questions we had. Then when we got to the sand dunes, Abrahams experience and skills had time to shine! He was so patient with us as we learned to sand board - which was SO fun! I only wish we could have had a longer time there in the dunes - once we started we really didnt want to stop!

reviews.title: Great day trip
reviews.text: Was a great trip out to the dunes + 3 runs of boarding down the hills. Thanks for the lessons and cool photos! Sandboarding is a lot harder than snowboarding

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.text: I cannot recommend this highly enough it is AMAZING,! We got picked up from our hotel in Lima on time by Abraham (instructor) and Eddie our hilarious driver - buzzed out of Lima and hit the dunes! My 17 year old twins loved every minute, and I was so relieved we had such a fab team as I was a little apprehensive to start.  The mountains are beautiful and it was well worth the trip.  Cheaper than the other companies I took the gamble and was very pleased I did.  Take this company and dont worry as they are BRILLIANT,!

reviews.title: Exhilarating fun
reviews.text: This was a thrilling experience.  I was worried that being overweight I wouldnt be able to enjoy it but Abraham taught me how to use the Sandboard as a sled.  It was a great experience.  We were a group of 5 and the guides made sure everyone had a good time. Be warned the ride to get up the sand dunes is part of the experience. Weve never been skiing or snowboarding much less sandboarding and with no experience we still had some great runs.

reviews.title: Once in a lifetime, only in Lima!
reviews.text: Peru is about bucket lists. No better place to empty the bucket than in an equatorial desert. This adventure is way more than supreme sand boarding with the ocean on the horizon. Carlos as your dune driver and DJ is extraordinary. The pan sandwiches from the wood fired oven a sumptuous surprise. Frost is an incredible instructor who makes even beginners successful sandboarders.  My 20 yo said this was his far out favorite activity in Peru. More memorable than Machu Picchu. Once in a lifetime, only in Lima!

reviews.title: Awesome sandboarding trip!
reviews.text: We had such a blast doing this sandboarding, an experience we will always remember! Provided everything we needed to have a great time.  Thank you!

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.text: Some friends and I were in Peru. We were supposed to do a hike but because of Covid we couldnt do it. Carlos, our guide reached out and gave us other options, one being Sandboarding. We had the most amazing experience. Aldo, his parter was not only a great instructor, but also took awesome pictures and videos that my friends and I reposted. All in all, an amazing experience.
